L

LED - class model.LED.
LED extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a light-emitting diode.
LED(Model) - Constructor for class model.LED
Constructs a solitary new LED object.
LEDImage - class gui.LEDImage.
The gui part of an LED.
LEDImage() - Constructor for class gui.LEDImage
Creates a new instance of LEDImage
LEDImage(Gui, Point) - Constructor for class gui.LEDImage
Constructs a new instance of LEDImage with a given location in the sandbox.
LOGIC - Static variable in class model.LogicComponent
a component's function if it has inputs and outputs
LogicComponent - class model.LogicComponent.
LogicComponent is the abstract class that all components extend.
LogicComponent() - Constructor for class model.LogicComponent
Empty constructor used only when a component doesn't know how many inputs and outputs it will have.
LogicComponent(Model, int, int) - Constructor for class model.LogicComponent
Initializes a new LogicComponent object.
LogicComponent.ConnectionPoint - class model.LogicComponent.ConnectionPoint.
A ConnectionPoint object encapsulates all the information necessary to represent the endpoint of a connection made to a LogicComponent: the component, the pin number on the component and the id number of the wire attached to the pin on the component, if it exists (otherwise null).
LogicComponentFactory - class model.LogicComponentFactory.
Provides functionality for creating LogicComponent objects from a given type string.
leftClickedX - Variable in class gui.Displayable
the x coordinate of the mouse when the left button was pressed (in screen units)
leftClickedX - Variable in class gui.PlaceholderPin
the x coordinate of the mouse when the left button was pressed (in screen units)
leftClickedY - Variable in class gui.Displayable
the y coordinate of the mouse when the left button was pressed (in screen units)
leftClickedY - Variable in class gui.PlaceholderPin
the y coordinate of the mouse when the left button was pressed (in screen units)
loadComponent(String) - Method in class gui.Toybox
Loads a custom component into the tree, given a type string of the component.
loadComponentDialog() - Method in class gui.Toybox
Displays a dialog to load a custom component.
loadImages(List) - Method in class gui.ComponentImage
Loads a list of image files representing the component.
loadModel(File) - Method in class controller.Controller
Loads a new model, discarding the old model object.
loadPinLocations() - Static method in class gui.ComponentImage
Loads the visual locations for all components' input and output pins from a text file.
loadToToybox(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Instructs the toybox to load the specified component into its custom components category.
loadToToybox(String) - Method in class gui.Gui
Instructs the toybox to load the specified component into its custom components category.
logicComponent - Variable in class gui.ComponentImage
the corresponding logic component in the model
